EmailTemplate.name: Validation_Requesting SRP/SREC form
EmailTemplate.subject: Lease Contract Validation - {!Account.Name} - NJ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Team,
We are done with the validation of the contract. Kindly inform us once the SRP form is available so we can move forward to countersignature.
Thanks, Angereen Bernadeth F Marquices| Analyst, Financial Products Originations SunPower | PO BOX 82387, Austin, TX 78708-2387 | Phone 1.800.SUNPOWER | Fax 1-512-684-0288 | SunpowerFinancing@sunpower.com
